English.alert.about:
WatchCuts and Cronios brings back the ability to run shortcuts automatically from your Apple Watch.

WatchCuts also lets you run shortcuts automatically on your iPad too!
English.alert.reminders.delete.title: Delete Unused Shortcut Reminders
English.alert.reminders.delete: You will be prompted to delete shortcut reminders that you are no longer using.
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval: This may take a few moments.
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval.title: Retrieving Shortcuts
English.prompt.add: Add shortcuts to your Apple Watch.
English.prompt.remove: Remove shortcuts from your Apple Watch.
English.prompt.search: Search for shortcuts. Searches are case-sensitive.
